name: Access to personal records by an employee organization
text: [§89-16.5]  Access to personal records by an employee organization.  Exclusive representatives shall be allowed access to an employee's personal records which are relevant to the investigation or processing of a grievance.  The exclusive representative shall not share or disclose the specific information contained in the personal records and shall notify the employee that access has been obtained. [L 1988, c 262, §2]
